column12:
#basic


##How the contribution team works? 
#fuchicorp/plans/basic


## Questions
1. Who is contributor?
2. How to become a contributors?
3. What is sprint? 
4. What is standup? 
5. What is next after ticket finished? 
6. How contribution will help my tech skills?


## Schedule
Stand-up: Weekdays at 12:00pm CST.
Class: Tuesday and Thursday at 6pm CST  -  9 PM CST


## How to become a contributors?
1. Sign the NDA  
2. Finish all the basic tickets
3. Are you really ready?
	1. Can you join all the meetings?
	2. Can you work on the tickets?
4. Make sure you all internal deployments up and running with master code
	1. Networking -> master branch 
	2. Cluster infrastructure -> master branch 
	3. Common tools -> master branch 
5. Schedule your interview
6. Pick your first ticket from the board 


## Contribution and Basic off boarding rules
1. 5 missing meetings going to be off boarded 
2. Make sure all the tickets are up to date 
3. Ticket is not finished on estimated time or not getting updated
4. Common tools should be up and running with master code


## What is sprint?
1. Duration 3 weeks
2. Team level overview
3. Meetings
	1. Sprint planing
		1. Each ticket overview
		2. Estimate the ticket value/end date 
		3. Move the ticket to contribution board
		4. Ticket picked up by someone
		5. Total points in sprint X 
	2. Sprint retrospective
		1. To improve or add 
		2. What to review or request for demo? 
		3. What went well?


## What is standup? 
1. Every workday at 12pm CST
2. Duration expected 2 minutes for each person 
3. Things to talk
	1. What are you going to do today?
	2. What did you do yesterday?
	3. Any questions or blockers?



## What is next after ticket picked?
1. Re-search
2. Learn and ask questions 
3. Do source changed
4. Document
5. Demonstrate 



## Contribution team 
15 people
Each person working on something new 
Demonstrate 5 tickets



### Points for each ticket
1 points -> 1 day
2 points -> 2 day
3 points -> 3 day
4 points -> 4 day
5 points -> 5 days
7 points -> 1 week
9 points -> One Sprint

column2: Please fix cache location
column12:
#contributors



Hello team,

The cache of the values.yaml is trying to re-create every terraform apply. Please see example logs from the common_tools job. We want to make sure that if there is no changes in values.yaml terraform should not create that file

the Jenkins job was applied and successfully finished
https://jenkins.fuchicorp.com/job/common-tools-deploy/53/console

If you will see the logs terraform detects changes
https://jenkins.fuchicorp.com/job/common-tools-deploy/54/console

Please reference
Filesystem and Workspace Info
path.module is the filesystem path of the module where the expression is placed.
path.root is the filesystem path of the root module of the configuration.
path.cwd is the filesystem path of the current working directory. In normal use of Terraform this is the same as path.root, but some advanced uses of Terraform run it from a directory other than the root module directory, causing these paths to be different.

column2: Helm upgrade to version 3.3.2
column12:
#contributors



Hello team

We currently use version helm2.14, but we run into an issue with upgrading Jenkins due to the old helm version, it is been suggested to upgrade to helm version 3.3.2 to complete Jenkins upgrade.
Please depreciate the tiller "google_k8s_tiller_deployment.tf" and upgrade to helm3.

Github solution for jenkins error jenkinsci/helm-charts#193

Thank you

https://jenkins.fuchicorp.com/job/common-tools-deploy/51/console

Thank you

column2: Jenkins snapshot script repeating when restarting Jenkins
column12:
#contributors



Hello Team!

While restoring the Fuchicorp Jenkins we found that the script will keep repeating "Jenkins is restarting" over and over. It doesn't stop even when the Jenkins is up and running with restored files. Please investigate and fix this issue. The script should tell us when it restarts the jenkins and when the jenkins is back up.

Thank you!

Add to members to Github Team for Github-Members-Management Jenkins job
column12:
#contributors



Hello Team!

We have a Fuchicorp Jenkins job under the "management tab" that will invite and delete a list of members.

We would now like to add another feature to add Fuchicorp members to different teams (ex: common-jenkins-admin). Currently, we manually add each team member to other teams on Github. An example of this would be when we added fuchicorp "member" teams to the "common-jenkins-admin" teams too, so they have admin access to their jenkins.

Here are our teams available in Fuchicorp for reference Fuchicorp Github Teams. If you look up your name you will see you are part of more than one team.

Create Parameter - Add a list of member names to a list of teams (common-jenkins-admin, fuchicorp-jenkins-admin, DevOps)
Use existing jenkins job to add memebers to teams
Only FuchiCorp Jenkins admins should be able to run the job

You can find our current script for Onboarding and Offboarding HERE

Thank you!

column2: Jenkins job for Onboarding
column12:
#contributors



Hello Team!

We would like to create a Fuchicorp Jenkins job under the "management tab" that will onboard a list of members. We would need a parameter to add the list of members for the script to run. The job will run the onboarding script "add-user-org.py" located common_scripts > github-management > manage-user.

Create Parameter - Add a list of member names for the script to run the for loop.
Create Pod template - Add the commands needed to clone the common_scripts repo and run the "add-user-org.py" script with the above parameter names entered.
Only FuchiCorp Jenkins admins should be able to run the job
Here are similar Jenkins job configurations like Hello-world create job and Github Labels to help give direction on setting up parameters and running scripts.

Thank you!
Kelly Salrin

column12:
#contributors



Hello team,

Our bastion host is pretty old and it's using old configurations. Please go ahead and deploy the new bastion host with the latest source code.

Steps
Deploy own bastion host
Get creds from @fsadykov and deploy to fuchicorp account
Make sure all users are onboarded properly
Move all tfvars and *json to each users home directory in new basion host
Update DNS to new bastion
Deprecate old bastion host if everything works

Follow the documentation
https://github.com/fuchicorp/cluster-infrastructure/tree/master/fuchicorp-bastion

Please watch this video to understand more
https://academy.fuchicorp.com/videos/topics/watch/260
